pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt, long pants; Chemical-resistant gloves made of any waterproof material; Chemical resistant footwear and socks
pesticide.company_name: PRIME SOURCE, A DIVISION OF ALBAUGH LLC

Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to by a poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Inhaled: Move person to fresh air. If person is not breathing, call 911 or an ambulance, then give artificial respiration, preferably by mouth-to-mouth, if possible. Call a poison control center or doctor for further treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Probable mucosal damage may contraindicate the use of gastric lavage.
Safety_Information.general_Info: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor, or going for treatment. For emergency information concerning this product, call your poison control center at 1-800-222-1222. For Chemical Spill, Leak, Fire, or Exposure, call CHEMTREC 1-800-424-9300.
